00030 
00031 void EOutersphere::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00032 
00033     string key = "options.eoutersphere";
00034 
00035     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure -----
00036      *
00037      * <eoutersphere>
00038      *
00039      *      <multipoles>MULTIPOLES.XML</multipoles>
00040      *
00041      *      <method></method>
00042      *      <pekar></pekar>
00043      *      <cutoff></cutoff>
00044      *
00045      * </eoutersphere>
00046      *
00047      */
00048 
00049     _method = opt->get(key+".method").as<string> ();
00050 
00051     if (_method == "constant") {
00052         _lambdaConstant = opt->get(key+".lambdaconst").as<double> ();
00053     }
00054     else if (_method == "spheres") {
00055         _pekarFactor = opt->get(key+".pekar").as<double> ();
00056     }
00057     else if (_method == "dielectric") {
00058         _pekarFactor = opt->get(key+".pekar").as<double> ();
00059         _lambdaCutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff").as<double> ();
00060     }
00061     else {
00062         cout << "ERROR: Typo? Method for reorg. energy calc.: " << _method;
00063         throw std::runtime_error("Possible typo in options file.");
00064     }
00065 
00066     this->EStatify(top, opt);
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void EOutersphere::EStatify(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00071 
00072     cout << endl << "... ... Estatify system: ";
00073 
00074     string key = "options.eoutersphere";
00075     string allocFile = options->get(key+".multipoles").as<string> ();
00076 
00077     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00078     // Load polar-site indices from XML //
00079     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00080 
00081     // => Output to maps:
00082     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00083     map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00084     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n;
00085     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e;
00086     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h;
00087 
00088     Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
00089     load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
00090 
00091 
00092     /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
00093      *
00094      * <topology>
00095      *
00096      *     <molecules>
00097      *          <molecule>
00098      *          <name></name>
00099      *
00100      *          <segments>
00101      *
00102      *              <segment>
00103      *              <name>DCV</name>
00104      *
00105      *              <multipoles_n></multipoles_n>
00106      *              <multipoles_e></multipoles_e>
00107      *              <multipoles_h></multipoles_h>
00108      *
00109      *              <map2md></map2md>
00110      *
00111      *              <fragments>
00112      *                  <fragment>
00113      *                  <name></name>
00114      *                  <mpoles></mpoles>
00115      *                  </fragment>
00116      *              </fragments>
00117      *              ...
00118      *              ...
00119      */
00120 
00121 
00122     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00123     list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
00124     list<Property *>::iterator molit;
00125     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
00126 
00127         string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00128 
00129         key = "segments.segment";
00130         list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00131         list<Property *>::iterator segit;
00132 
00133         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
00134 
00135             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00136 
00137             // GDMA filenames for cation (h), neutral (n), anion (e) state
00138             string mpoleFile_n = (*segit)->get("multipoles_n").as<string> ();
00139             alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n[segName] = mpoleFile_n;
00140             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_e")) {
00141                 string mpoleFile_e = (*segit)->get("multipoles_e").as<string>();
00142                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e[segName] = mpoleFile_e;
00143             }
00144             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_h")) {
00145                 string mpoleFile_h = (*segit)->get("multipoles_h").as<string>();
00146                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h[segName] = mpoleFile_h;
00147             }
00148 
00149             // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
00150             if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
00151                 int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
00152                 _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
00153             }
00154             else {
00155                 _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
00156             }
00157 
00158             key = "fragments.fragment";
00159             list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
00160             list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
00161 
00162             for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
00163 
00164                 string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00165                 string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
00166 
00167                 string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
00168 
00169                 Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
00170                 vector<string> mpoleInfo;
00171                 tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
00172 
00173                 vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
00174                 vector<string> mpoleNames;
00175 
00176                 vector<string> ::iterator strit;
00177                 for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
00178 
00179                     Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
00180                     vector<string> poleInfo;
00181                     tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
00182 
00183                     int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
00184                     string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
00185 
00186                     mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
00187                     mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
00188 
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
00192                 alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
00193             }
00194         }
00195     }
00196 
00197     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00198     // Parse GDMA punch files //
00199     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00200 
00201     // => Output to PolarSite Container (template container)
00202     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
00203     map<string, vector<bool> >       map_seg_chrgStates;
00204 
00205 
00206     // Multipoles for neutral state
00207     int state = 0;
00208     map<string, string > ::iterator strit;
00209     for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.begin();
00210          strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.end();
00211          strit++) {
00212 
00213         string segName = strit->first;
00214         string filename = strit->second;
00215 
00216         vector< PolarSite* > poles = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00217 
00218         map_seg_polarSites[segName] = poles;
00219         map_seg_chrgStates[segName].resize(3);
00220         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][0] = false; // <- negative
00221         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][1] = true;  // <- neutral
00222         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][2] = false; // <- positive
00223         poles.clear();
00224 
00225     }
00226 
00227     // Multipoles for negative state
00228     state = -1;
00229     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.size() ) {
00230         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.begin();
00231              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.end();
00232              strit++) {
00233             string segName = strit->first;
00234             string filename = strit->second;
00235 
00236             vector< PolarSite* > polesAnion = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00237             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00238 
00239             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00240             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
00241 
00242             assert(polesAnion.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00243             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00244 
00245                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesAnion[i]->getQs(state), state );
00246                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesAnion[i]->getPs(state), state );
00247                 delete polesAnion[i];
00248             }
00249             polesAnion.clear();
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00253     // Multipoles for positive state
00254     state = +1;
00255     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.size() ) {
00256         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.begin();
00257              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.end();
00258              strit++) {
00259             string segName = strit->first;
00260             string filename = strit->second;
00261 
00262             vector< PolarSite* > polesCation = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00263             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00264 
00265             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00266             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
00267 
00268             assert(polesCation.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00269             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00270 
00271                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesCation[i]->getQs(state), state );
00272                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesCation[i]->getPs(state), state );
00273                 delete polesCation[i];
00274             }
00275             polesCation.clear();
00276         }
00277     }
00278 
00279     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00280     // Forward information on polar-site templates to topology //
00281     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00282 
00283     // Containers to use for mapping
00284     // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     map_seg_polarSites;
00285     // map<string, vector<int> >            alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00286     // map<string, vector<string> >         alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00287 
00288     // TO CONTINUE FROM HERE ...
00289     // Loop over segments, loop over fragments in segments.
00290     // => For each segment, look up associated polar sites using map 1;
00291     //      => For each fragment, look up associated
00292     //         polar sites idcs. using map 2;
00293     //          => For each index in retrieved container, create new polar site,
00294     //             importing information from polar site container of segment
00295     //          => Translate positions to MD frame, copy local frame from
00296     //             fragment
00297 
00298     _map_seg_polarSites = map_seg_polarSites;
00299     _map_seg_chrgStates = map_seg_chrgStates;
00300     _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx =  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00301     _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00305 vector<PolarSite*> EOutersphere::ParseGdmaFile(string filename, int state) {
00306 
00307     int poleCount = 1;
00308     double Q0_total = 0.0;
00309     string units = "";
00310     bool useDefaultPs = true;
00311 
00312     vector<PolarSite*> poles;
00313     PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
00314 
00315     vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
00316     double         P1; // <- dipole polarizability
00317 
00318     std::string line;
00319     std::ifstream intt;
00320     intt.open(filename.c_str());
00321 
00322     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00323         while ( intt.good() ) {
00324 
00325             std::getline(intt, line);
00326             vector<string> split;
00327             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00328             toker.ToVector(split);
00329 
00330             if ( !split.size()      ||
00331                   split[0] == "!"   ||
00332                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
00333 
00334     // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
00335     // ! DCV2T opt
00336     // ! SP        RB3LYP          6-311+G(d,p)
00337     // Units bohr
00338     //
00339     // C          -4.2414603400   -3.8124751600    0.0017575736    Rank  2
00340     //  -0.3853409355
00341     //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
00342     //  -0.7220625314   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545   0.4526409813  -0.50937399
00343     //  P 1.75
00344 
00345 
00346             // Units used
00347             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
00348                 units = split[1];
00349                 if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
00350                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00351                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00352                 }
00353             }
00354 
00355             // element,  position,  rank limit
00356             else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
00357 
00358                 Qs.clear();
00359                 P1 = -1.;
00360 
00361                 int id = poleCount++;  // <- starts from 1
00362                 string name = split[0];
00363 
00364                 double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00365                 double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
00366                 double x, y, z;
00367 
00368                 if (units == "bohr") {
00369                     x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00370                     y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00371                     z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00372                 }
00373                 else if (units == "angstrom") {
00374                     x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00375                     y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00376                     z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00377                 }
00378                 else {
00379                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00380                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00381                 }
00382 
00383                 vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
00384 
00385                 int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
00386 
00387                 PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
00388                 newPole->setRank(rank);
00389                 newPole->setPos(pos);
00390                 poles.push_back(newPole);
00391                 thisPole = newPole;
00392 
00393             }
00394 
00395             // 'P', dipole polarizability
00396             else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
00397                 P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00398                 thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
00399                 useDefaultPs = false;
00400             }
00401 
00402             // multipole line
00403             else {
00404 
00405                 int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
00406 
00407                 if (lineRank == 0) {
00408                     Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
00409                 }
00410 
00411                 for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
00412 
00413                     double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
00414 
00415                     // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
00416                     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00417                     qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
00418 
00419                     Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
00420 
00421                 }
00422                 thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
00423             }
00424 
00425         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00426     }
00427     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
00428 
00429     cout << endl << "... ... ... Reading " << filename <<
00430                     ": Q0(Total) = " << Q0_total << flush;
00431 
00432     if (useDefaultPs) {
00433 
00434         cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
00435              << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
00436 
00437         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
00438         for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
00439             string elem = (*pol)->getName();
00440             double alpha = 0.0;
00441             // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
00442             if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3;  } // <- conversion from
00443             else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
00444             else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
00445             else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
00446             else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
00447             // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
00448             //if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
00449             //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
00450             //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
00451             //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
00452             //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
00453             else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
00454                                        "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
00455             (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
00456         }
00457     }
00458 
00459     return poles;
00460 
00461 }
00462 
00463 
00464 void EOutersphere::DistributeMpoles(Topology *top) {
00465 
00466     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00467     // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
00468     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00469 
00470     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00471     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00472          sit < top->Segments().end();
00473          ++sit) {
00474 
00475         Segment *seg = *sit;
00476         vector<PolarSite*> poleSites = _map_seg_polarSites.at(seg->getName());
00477         seg->setChrgStates(_map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()]);
00478 
00479         bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
00480 
00481         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
00482         for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
00483              fit < seg->Fragments().end();
00484              ++fit) {
00485 
00486             Fragment *frag = *fit;
00487 
00488             string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
00489                          + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
00490             vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
00491             vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
00492 
00493             if (map2md) {
00494                 if (polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
00495                     cout << endl << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName() <<
00496                             " Fragment " << frag->getName() <<
00497                             ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar sites "
00498                             " as there are atoms to perform mapping. " << endl;
00499                     throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
00500                 }
00501             }
00502 
00503 
00504             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
00505 
00506                 string name = namesInFrag[i];
00507                 int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
00508 
00509                 PolarSite *templ = poleSites[poleId-1];
00510                 PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
00511                 newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
00512                 seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
00513                 frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
00514 
00515                 // Shift + rotate
00516                 if (!map2md) {
00517                     newSite->Translate(frag->getTransQM2MD());
00518                     newSite->Rotate(frag->getRotQM2MD(), frag->getCoMD());
00519                 }
00520                 else {
00521                     vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
00522                     newSite->setPos(mdpos);
00523                     if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
00524                         cout << endl << "ERROR: MAP2MD = TRUE "
00525                         " prevents use of higher-rank multipoles. " << endl;
00526                         throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
00527                     }
00528                 }
00529             }
00530         }
00531     }
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 QMPair *EOutersphere::RequestNextPair(int opId, Topology *top) {
00536     
00537     _nextPairMutex.Lock();
00538 
00539     QMPair *workOnThis;
00540 
00541     if (_nextPair == top->NBList().end()) {
00542         workOnThis = NULL;
00543     }
00544     else {
00545         workOnThis = *_nextPair;
00546         ++_nextPair;
00547         cout << "\r... ... OP " << opId
00548              << " evaluating energy for pair "
00549              << workOnThis->getId() << flush;
00550     }
00551 
00552     _nextPairMutex.Unlock();
00553 
00554     return workOnThis;
00555 }
00556 
00557 
00558 bool EOutersphere::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00559 
00560     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
00561     // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
00562     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
00563 
00564     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
00565     if (!top->isRigid()) {
00566         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00567         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
00568     }
00569     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
00570 
00571     // Forward multipoles to topology
00572     if (!top->isEStatified()) {
00573         this->DistributeMpoles(top);
00574         cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
00575                  << " multipole sites.";
00576     }
00577     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already estatified."; }
00578 
00579 
00580     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00581     // Create + start threads (Site Ops) //
00582     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00583 
00584     vector<PairOpOutersphere*> pairOps;
00585     _nextPair = top->NBList().begin();
00586     cout << endl;
00587 
00588     // Forward to first segment specified in options
00589     //for ( ; (*_nextPair)->getId() != this->_firstSeg &&
00590     //          _nextSite < top->Segments().end(); ++_nextSite) { ; }
00591 
00592     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00593         PairOpOutersphere *newOp = new PairOpOutersphere(id, top, this);
00594         pairOps.push_back(newOp);
00595     }
00596 
00597     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00598         pairOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
00599     }
00600 
00601     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00602         pairOps[id]->Start();
00603     }
00604 
00605     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00606         pairOps[id]->WaitDone();
00607     }
00608 
00609     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
00610         delete pairOps[id];
00611     }
00612 
00613     pairOps.clear();
00614 
00615 
00616 
00617 
00618 
00619     //if      (_method == "constant")   { this->ConstLambda(top); }
00620     //else if (_method == "spheres")    { this->SpheresLambda(top);}
00621     //else if (_method == "dielectric") { this->DielectricLambda(top); }
00622 }
00623 
00624 
00625 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00626 // PAIR OPERATOR MEMBER FUNCTS //
00627 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00628 
00629 void EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::EvalSite(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair) {
00630 
00631     this->_segsSphere.clear();
00632     this->_polsSphere.clear();
00633     this->_polsPair.clear();
00634 
00635     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00636     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
00637 
00638         // TODO Introduce volume-correction when using cutoff
00639         //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(), qmpair->getPos()))
00640         //        > _master->_lambdaCutoff) { continue; }
00641 
00642         if ( (*sit)->getId() == qmpair->Seg1()->getId() ||
00643              (*sit)->getId() == qmpair->Seg2()->getId() ) {
00644              _polsPair.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
00645         }
00646 
00647         else {
00648             _segsSphere.push_back(*sit);
00649             _polsSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
00650         }
00651     }
00652 
00653     bool hasCation = qmpair->first->hasChrgState(+1)
00654                   && qmpair->second->hasChrgState(+1);
00655     bool hasAnion  = qmpair->first->hasChrgState(-1)
00656                   && qmpair->second->hasChrgState(-1);
00657 
00658     if (hasCation) {
00659         int state = +1;
00660         this->ResetFields();
00661         this->ChargeDeltaPair(state);
00662         double lOut = this->CalcOuter(top, qmpair, state);
00663         qmpair->setLambdaO(lOut, state);
00664         this->ResetFields();
00665     }
00666 
00667     if (hasAnion) {
00668         int state = -1;
00669         this->ResetFields();
00670         this->ChargeDeltaPair(state);
00671         double lOut = this->CalcOuter(top, qmpair, state);
00672         qmpair->setLambdaO(lOut, state);
00673         this->ResetFields();
00674     }
00675 }
00676 
00677 
00678 double EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::CalcOuter(Topology *top, QMPair *qmpair, int state) {
00679 
00680     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
00681     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
00682     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
00683     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;    
00684 
00685 
00686     double dD2dV = 0.0;
00687     double int2displ = 1/(4*M_PI) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-18;
00688     //double int2eV   = 8.854187817e-12 *int2N_C*int2N_C /1.602176487e-19;
00689 
00690     int polCount = 0;
00691 
00692     for (sit1 = _polsSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
00693     for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
00694 
00695         ++polCount;
00696 
00697     for (sit2 = _polsPair.begin(); sit2 < _polsPair.end(); ++sit2) {
00698     for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
00699 
00700         this->_actor.Field_AT_DUE(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
00701 
00702     }}
00703         dD2dV += (*pit1)->FPx * (*pit1)->FPx +
00704                  (*pit1)->FPy * (*pit1)->FPy +
00705                  (*pit1)->FPz * (*pit1)->FPz;
00706     }}
00707 
00708     dD2dV *= int2displ * int2displ;
00709 
00710     return 0.5 * _master->_pekarFactor/8.854187817e-12
00711                * top->BoxVolume()*1.000e-27/top->PolarSites().size()
00712                * dD2dV /1.602176487e-19;
00713 }
00714 
00715 
00716 void EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::ChargeDeltaPair(int state) {
00717 
00718     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
00719     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
00720 
00721     sit = _polsPair.begin();
00722 
00723     for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
00724         (*pit)->ChargeDelta(state, 0);
00725     }
00726 
00727     ++sit;
00728 
00729     for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
00730         (*pit)->ChargeDelta(0, state);
00731     }
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00735 void EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::ResetFields() {
00736 
00737     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
00738     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
00739 
00740     for (sit = _polsSphere.begin(); sit < _polsSphere.end(); ++sit) {
00741         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
00742             (*pit)->ResetFieldP();
00743         }
00744     }
00745 }
00746 
00747 
00748 void EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::Run(void) {
00749 
00750     while (true) {
00751 
00752         _pair = _master->RequestNextPair(_id, _top);
00753 
00754         if (_pair == NULL) { break; }
00755         else { this->EvalSite(_top, _pair); }
00756     }
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
00761 
00762     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
00763     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
00764     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
00765     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
00766 
00767     _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
00768     assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
00769 
00770     for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
00771          sitRef < top->Segments().end();
00772          ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
00773 
00774         (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
00775 
00776         for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
00777              pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
00778              pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
00779              ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
00780 
00781             *pitNew = new PolarSite();
00782             (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
00783             (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
00784         }
00785     }
00786 }
00787 
00788 
00789 EOutersphere::PairOpOutersphere::~PairOpOutersphere() {
00790 
00791     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
00792     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pol;
00793 
00794     for (sit = _polarSites.begin(); sit < _polarSites.end(); ++sit) {
00795         for (pol = (*sit).begin(); pol < (*sit).end(); ++pol) {
00796             delete *pol;
00797         }
00798         (*sit).clear();
00799     }
00800     _polarSites.clear();
00801 }

00805 // CHEAPER METHODS (DISCARDED) //
00806 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00807 
00808 void EOutersphere::ConstLambda(Topology *top) {
00809 
00810     QMNBList ::iterator pit;
00811     for (pit = top->NBList().begin(); pit != top->NBList().end(); pit++) {
00812         QMPair *pair = *pit;
00813         assert (false); // TODO e, h calc. // pair->setLambdaO(_lambdaConstant);
00814     }
00815 }
00816 
00817 
00818 void EOutersphere::SpheresLambda(Topology *top) {
00819     
00820     double e = 1.602176487e-19;
00821     double EPS0 = 8.85418782e-12;
00822     double NM = 1e-09;    
00823     
00824     QMNBList ::iterator pit;
00825     for (pit = top->NBList().begin(); pit != top->NBList().end(); pit++) {
00826         QMPair *pair = *pit;
00827 
00828         // TODO extract radii from input
00829         throw std::runtime_error(" EOutersphere -> Need to read in radii");
00830         double R1 = 1;
00831         double R2 = 2;
00832         double lambda = _pekarFactor * e / (4.*M_PI*EPS0) *
00833                                      (  1. / ( 2.*R1*NM )
00834                                       + 1. / ( 2.*R2*NM )
00835                                       - 1. / ( pair->Dist()*NM ));
00836         assert (false); // TODO e, h calc. // pair->setLambdaO(lambda);
00837     }
00838 }
00839 
00840 
00841 void EOutersphere::DielectricLambda(Topology *top) {
00842 
00843     double e = 1.602176487e-19;
00844     double EPS0 = 8.85418782e-12;
00845     double NM = 1.e-09;
00846     double NM3 = 1.e-27;
00847 
00848     QMNBList ::iterator pit;
00849     for (pit = top->NBList().begin(); pit != top->NBList().end(); pit++) {
00850 
00851         QMPair *pair = *pit;
00852         double lambda = 0.;
00853         vec seg1pos = pair->Seg1()->getPos();
00854         vec seg2pos = pair->Seg2()->getPos();
00855 
00856         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00857         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00858              sit < top->Segments().end();
00859              sit++) {
00860              Segment *seg = *sit;
00861 
00862              // Segment external to pair? Cut-off obeyed?
00863              if ( seg == pair->Seg1() || seg == pair->Seg2() ) { continue; }
00864 
00865              vec dR1bc = top->PbShortestConnect( seg->getPos(), seg1pos );
00866              vec dR2bc = top->PbShortestConnect( seg->getPos(), seg2pos );
00867              if ( abs( (dR1bc+dR2bc)*0.5 ) > _lambdaCutoff ) { continue; }
00868 
00869              vec dR1   = seg1pos - seg->getPos();
00870              vec dR2   = seg2pos - seg->getPos();
00871              vec shift1 = dR1bc - dR1;
00872              vec shift2 = dR2bc - dR2;
00873 
00874              vector< Atom* > ::iterator ait;
00875              vector< Atom* > ::iterator bit;
00876              for (ait = seg->Atoms().begin(); ait < seg->Atoms().end(); ait++) {
00877 
00878                  Atom *Ext = *ait;
00879                  // Electric induction field
00880                  vec D = vec(0.,0.,0.);
00881 
00882                  for (bit = pair->Seg1()->Atoms().begin();
00883                          bit < pair->Seg1()->Atoms().end();
00884                          bit++) {
00885 
00886                      Atom *Int = *bit;
00887                      
00888                      double dQ = Int->getQ(-1) - Int->getQ(0);
00889                      
00890                      vec R = Ext->getPos() - Int->getPos() - shift1;
00891                      double dr = abs(R);
00892                      double dr3 = dr*dr*dr;
00893 
00894                      D += e * dQ / (4.*M_PI*dr3*NM3) * R * NM;
00895 
00896                  }
00897 
00898                  for (bit = pair->Seg2()->Atoms().begin();
00899                          bit < pair->Seg2()->Atoms().end();
00900                          bit++) {
00901                      Atom *Int = *bit;
00902 
00903                      double dQ = Int->getQ(0) - Int->getQ(-1);
00904                      
00905                      vec R = Ext->getPos() - Int->getPos() - shift2;
00906                      double dr = abs(R);
00907                      double dr3 = dr*dr*dr;
00908 
00909                      D += e * dQ / (4.*M_PI*dr3*NM3) * R * NM;
00910 
00911                  }
00912                  
00913                  lambda += 1/e * _pekarFactor/(2*EPS0)
00914                          * top->BoxVolume()*NM3 / top->Atoms().size();   
00915              } /* exit loop over external atoms in segment */
00916         } /* exit loop over external segments */
00917 
00918         assert (false); // TODO e, h calculation // pair->setLambdaO(lambda);
00919 
00920     } /* exit loop over pairs */
00921 
00922 }
00923 
00924 
00925 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00926 // INTERACTOR MEMBER FUNCTIONS //
00927 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00928 
00929 void EOutersphere::InteractorMod::Field_AT_DUE(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol) {
00930 
00931     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
00932     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol.getPos());
00933     R    = 1/abs(e12);
00934     R2   = R*R;
00935     R3   = R2*R;
00936     R4   = R3*R;
00937     R5   = R4*R;
00938     e12 *= R;
00939 
00940         rax = e12.getX();
00941         ray = e12.getY();
00942         raz = e12.getZ();
00943         rbx = - rax;
00944         rby = - ray;
00945         rbz = - raz;
00946 
00947         cxx = 1;
00948         cxy = 0;
00949         cxz = 0;
00950         cyx = 0;
00951         cyy = 1;
00952         cyz = 0;
00953         czx = 0;
00954         czy = 0;
00955         czz = 1;
00956 
00957     double Fx = 0.0;
00958     double Fy = 0.0;
00959     double Fz = 0.0;
00960 
00961     // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
00962         Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
00963         Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
00964         Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
00965 
00966     // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
00967     if (pol._rank > 0) {
00968         Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
00969         Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
00970         Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
00971 
00972         Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
00973         Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
00974         Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
00975 
00976         Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
00977         Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
00978         Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
00979     }
00980 
00981     // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
00982     if (pol._rank > 1) {
00983         Fx += T1x_20()  * pol.Q20;
00984         Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
00985         Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
00986         Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
00987         Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
00988 
00989         Fy += T1y_20()  * pol.Q20;
00990         Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
00991         Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
00992         Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
00993         Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
00994 
00995         Fz += T1z_20()  * pol.Q20;
00996         Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
00997         Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
00998         Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
00999         Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
01000     }
01001 
01002     pol1.FPx += Fx;
01003     pol1.FPy += Fy;
01004     pol1.FPz += Fz;
01005 }
01006 
01007 
01008 
01009 }}
